de.unlixx.runpng.scene

Class ThumbnailView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
              • de.unlixx.runpng.scene.ThumbnailView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class ThumbnailView
extends javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
    Implementation of a ThumbnailView with multiple levels.
    CheckerboardShows a checkerboard pattern in case of transparencies.
    BackgroundShows an opaque to transparent plain colored background.
    ImageShows the image if one is loaded or it is transparent.
    CutframeShows a cutframe if the logical size of the loaded image is larger than the application settings.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThumbnailView

        public ThumbnailView(boolean bHorz,
                     double dSize)
        Constructor of this ThumbnailView with fix size for horizontal or vertical direction.
        Parameters:
        bHorz - If true then this view has a fix size horizontal size.
        dSize - The fix size horizontally or vertically.

      • ThumbnailView

        public ThumbnailView(boolean bHorz,
                     double dSize,
                     double dAppWidth,
                     double dAppHeight)
        Constructor of this ThumbnailView with fix size for horizontal or vertical direction. This shows the loaded image relative to the settings of the application size if both application dimensions are set. If the loaded image is larger than the application settings then a dotted cutframe is shown.
        Parameters:
        bHorz - If true then this view has a fix size horizontal size.
        dSize - The fix size horizontally or vertically.
        dAppWidth - The width from the application settings.
        dAppHeight - The height from the application settings.

        public boolean isHorizontal()
        Checks whether this ThumbnailView has a fix horizontal size.
        Returns:
        True if this ThumbnailView has a fix horizontal size. Afterwards it is vertically fix.

        Returns:

      • appSizeChanged

        public void appSizeChanged(double dAppWidth,
                           double dAppHeight)
        Called in the case of changed application size settings. If this ThumbnailView has been constructed with application dimensions then this causes a recalculation of the sizes and relations. If not then this invokation has no visible effect.
        Parameters:
        dAppWidth - The new application image width.
        dAppHeight - The new application image height.

      • getAppWidth

        public double getAppWidth()
        Gets the application width.
        Returns:
        a double with the application width if available. Afterwards it returns -1.

      • getAppHeight

        public double getAppHeight()
        Gets the application height.
        Returns:
        a double with the application height if available. Afterwards it returns -1.

      • isAppSizeRelated

        public boolean isAppSizeRelated()
        Checks whether this view is application size related.
        Returns:
        True if this view is application size related.

      • recalculateSizes

        public void recalculateSizes()
        Recalculates the sizes and relations if this ThumbnailView has been constructed with application width and height. Afterwards it does not very much.

      • isCutFrameVisible

        public boolean isCutFrameVisible()
        Checks whether the cutframe is shown.
        Returns:
        True if the cutframe is visible.
